MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Locations.Address> GetFromLocation (double latitude, double longitude, int maxResults);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Locations.Address> GetFromLocation(float64 latitude, float64 longitude, int32 maxResults) cil managed

Docs.param: the latitude a point for the search
the longitude a point for the search
max number of addresses to return. Smaller numbers (1 to 5) are recommended
Docs.summary: Returns an array of Addresses that are known to describe the area immediately surrounding the given latitude and longitude.
Docs.exception: if latitude is less than -90 or greater than 90
if longitude is less than -180 or greater than 180
if the network is unavailable or any other I/O problem occurs

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Locations.Address>> GetFromLocationAsync (double latitude, double longitude, int maxResults);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Locations.Address>> GetFromLocationAsync(float64 latitude, float64 longitude, int32 maxResults) cil managed
public System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Locations.Address> GetFromLocationName (string locationName, int maxResults);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Locations.Address> GetFromLocationName(string locationName, int32 maxResults) cil managed

Docs.param: a user-supplied description of a location
max number of results to return. Smaller numbers (1 to 5) are recommended
Docs.summary: Returns an array of Addresses that are known to describe the named location, which may be a place name such as "Dalvik, Iceland", an address such as "1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA", an airport code such as "SFO", etc.
Docs.exception: if the network is unavailable or any other I/O problem occurs

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Locations.Address> GetFromLocationName (string locationName, int maxResults, double lowerLeftLatitude, double lowerLeftLongitude, double upperRightLatitude, double upperRightLongitude);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Locations.Address> GetFromLocationName(string locationName, int32 maxResults, float64 lowerLeftLatitude, float64 lowerLeftLongitude, float64 upperRightLatitude, float64 upperRightLongitude) cil managed

Docs.param: a user-supplied description of a location
max number of addresses to return. Smaller numbers (1 to 5) are recommended
the latitude of the lower left corner of the bounding box
the longitude of the lower left corner of the bounding box
the latitude of the upper right corner of the bounding box
the longitude of the upper right corner of the bounding box
Docs.summary: Returns an array of Addresses that are known to describe the named location, which may be a place name such as "Dalvik, Iceland", an address such as "1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA", an airport code such as "SFO", etc.
Docs.exception: if any latitude is less than -90 or greater than 90
if any longitude is less than -180 or greater than 180
if the network is unavailable or any other I/O problem occurs
